bullets.text: Stephen I. Miran sworn in to Federal Reserve Board, potentially shifting policy debates.
U.S. G.17 industrial production data for August released, updating manufacturing momentum ahead of Fed decisions.
Markets price three Fed cuts by year-end; mortgage rates fall to 3-year low ahead of decision.
U.S. credit scores decline for second straight year as missed payments rise, signaling household financial stress.
Bessent sees U.S.-China trade deal likely before November reciprocal-tariffs deadline, easing market uncertainty.
House Republicans again defer tariff authority to Trump, reinforcing executive leverage over U.S. trade policy.
China’s tight rare-earths curbs hit European manufacturers, costing millions and underscoring strategic materials dependency.
Oracle and Silver Lake join TikTok investor group; Trump extends deadline as Oracle cloud pact persists pending China approval.
Tech giants plan $40B+ new AI investments in the UK, bolstering compute capacity, talent, and regional competitiveness.
StubHub prices IPO at $23.50, valuing company at $8.6B, testing investor appetite for ticket-resale economics.
Israeli ground forces push into Gaza City amid major buildup, escalating conflict and humanitarian risks.
Mars rock ‘leopard spots’ present potential biosignatures, offering strongest hint yet of past life, pending rigorous verification.
GLP-1 drugs like semaglutide alter taste perception and quiet 'food noise,' elucidating mechanisms behind reduced cravings and weight loss.
California gasoline prices risk further increases as refinery closures curtail supply, intensifying regional energy cost pressures.
